title: 5 bedroom available
posting_body: I am currently looking for a nice clean and responsible family to take over my lease as I will be relocating out of the area.
It’s a four bedroom (In Dallas Ranch Neighborhood)  with a double door bonus room (5th bedroom) off the formal living room and a 2 story high ceiling.
2 car garage and brand new carpet through out and brand new appliances.
Walking distance to a huge family park and schools.
Also you can walk to Antioch Golf Course Contra Loma Park.
Current rent is $3,700 with a $4,500 security deposit, landlord does accept section 8 with a decent credit score, excellent rental history and job verification.
I plan to move out mid October or sooner.
I will schedule a time if you like to view my home and provide you with my landlords contact info.
